ai-patthana20.1:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana20.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-patthana20.1:2.1_0: Not knowing the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana20.1:2.1_1: Not because of the teaching, the reason for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana20.1:2.1_2: causes and conditions for the sake of cause and conditions.
ai-patthana20.1:3.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana20.1:3.1_1: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana20.1:3.1_2: Not knowing and seeing causes and conditions for the sake of causes and conditions.
ai-patthana20.1:4.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana20.1:4.1_1: Not because of cause or condition for the sake of causes and conditions.
ai-patthana20.1:4.1_2: Not knowing and seeing causes and conditions for the sake of causes and conditions for the sake of causes and conditions.
ai-patthana20.1:6.1_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana20.1:7.1_0: Nothing is a cause and reason for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana20.1:7.1_1: Nothing is a cause and condition for the cause.
ai-patthana20.1:7.1_2: Not cause and reasons cause and reason why three things arise because of a cause and reason.
ai-patthana20.1:8.1_0: Nothing is a cause and condition for the reason.
ai-patthana20.1:8.1_1: Nothing is a cause and condition for the reason.
ai-patthana20.1:8.1_2: Not cause and reasons cause and reason why three things arise because of a cause and reason.
ai-patthana20.1:9.1_0: Not knowing and seeing causes and conditions for the sake of causes and conditions.
ai-patthana20.1:9.1_1: Not knowing and seeing causes and conditions for the sake of causes and conditions.
ai-patthana20.1:9.1_2: No cause and reason for the sake of cause and reason.
ai-patthana20.1:10.1_0: For the sake of investigating, relies on the five grounds for greed ...
ai-patthana20.1:11.1_0: No cause is a reason for seeing.
ai-patthana20.1:12.1_0: For the sake of investigating, relies on the five grounds for greed ...
ai-patthana20.1:13.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause and reason for the sake of causes and conditions for the sake of causes and conditions.
ai-patthana20.1:15.1_0: No causes and reason for the sake of purification by prioffing is for the sake of cause and reason.
ai-patthana20.1:17.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of thought that gives rise to sorrow.
